participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emily finds joy in making others happy through her baking and social gatherings.
participant_1.background: I enjoy baking with my father, and the most valuable thing I own is the time we spend together. 1984 is my favorite book. I like action movies. I have twelve kids. My biggest challenge was overcoming my eating disorder.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Meticulous and dedicated, Jake approaches his work with a strong work ethic and a passion for creating memorable experiences for others.
participant_2.background: I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future. I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car. I was a technical support engineer at a small startup before I got my current job. I have a career in party planning. I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for work?
That sounds fun! I love throwing parties.
I do too! I've been doing it for years.
Do you have any interesting stories from your work?
Once I had to plan a party for a hundred people in just one day.
Oh my gosh! That must have been stressful!
It was, but it was also really fun.
I bet! Do you have any tips for throwing a great party?
Well, the most important thing is to have a good theme.
And then you just have to make sure you have enough food and drinks, and that the music is good.
And don't forget to have fun!
